meanings.definition: To plan or carry out a strategy.
meanings.sent1: She likes to strategize before playing chess.
meanings.sent2: It is important to strategize before starting a business.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel decided to strategize how to get the nuts from the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: In the game of life, you must strategize your moves carefully.
meanings.sent5: To succeed in the mission, they must strategize their approach.

meanings.sent1: He will strategize a plan for the upcoming project.
meanings.sent2: They need to strategize a way to increase sales.
meanings.sent3: The penguins strategized a plan to steal the fish from the seals.
meanings.sent4: To win the battle, the general must strategize a brilliant tactic.
meanings.sent5: The team will strategize a new marketing campaign for the product launch.
